item.description:
Based on the play CHICAGO Shocking secrets bubble to the surface in this story of crime, greed and corruption. Ruthless journalists in 1930's Chicago compete to turn a murderess into a tabloid star. From "All that Jazz" to" Razzle Dazzle", the songs are as hot as the prohibition-era setting. We could have dinner prior at 5:30. Play starts at 7:30pm

 

PLEASE SEND A CHECK TO P.O. BOX 587 WILDER, VT.  05088

I HAVE PICKED UP TICKETS FOR THE 6 ON THIS LIST ALREADY.  TOTAL TO

BE SENT TO ME IS:  $43.46... LOOK FORWARD IN SEEING EVERYONE.

ALSO, IDEAS FOR DINNER.. COULD BE IN HANOVER... LIKE JESSE'S OR

SALT HILL FOR 5:30 DINNER.. SO GET THERE EARLIER...

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: NORTHERN STAGE: CHICAGO
